CPU: Apple M1
OS: macOS
Date (UTC): 2025-12-31 00:00:00 UTC+0000
------------------------

╔════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║     Sparse Ternary FMA Kernel - Comprehensive Benchmark       ║
║                                                                ║
║  Implementation: Scalar (Reference)
║  AVX-512 Support: No
╚════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
CORRECTNESS TESTS
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Test 1: Encode/Decode Correctness
----------------------------------
  -1 → 0x02 → -1 [PASS]
   0 → 0x00 →  0 [PASS]
   1 → 0x01 →  1 [PASS]

Test 2: Pack/Unpack Correctness
--------------------------------
  Array size: 1024 trits
  Packed size: 256 bytes (25.0% of original)
  Errors: 0
  Result: [PASS]

Test 3: Ternary Multiply Correctness
-------------------------------------
  12345 × -1 = -12345 (expected -12345) [PASS]
  12345 ×  0 = 0 (expected 0) [PASS]
  12345 ×  1 = 12345 (expected 12345) [PASS]

Test 4: Sparse Ternary FMA Correctness
---------------------------------------
  Array size: 256
  Errors: 0
  Result: [PASS]

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
PERFORMANCE BENCHMARKS
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Benchmark 1: Encoding Overhead
-------------------------------
  Array size: 16384 trits
  Iterations: 100000
  Pack time: 360.604 ms (3.606 μs/op)
  Unpack time: 1092.261 ms (10.923 μs/op)

Benchmark 2: Density Gain Validation
-------------------------------------
  Array size: 16384
  Iterations: 10000
  8-bit encoding: 242.833 ms (24.283 μs/op)
  2-bit encoding: 204.964 ms (20.496 μs/op)
  Speedup: 1.18×
  Memory saved: 12288 bytes (75.0%)

Benchmark 3: SIMD Throughput
-----------------------------
  Array size: 16384
  Iterations: 10000
  Scalar: 235.150 ms (23.515 μs/op)
  SIMD: 541.906 ms (54.191 μs/op)
  Speedup: 0.43×
  Throughput (scalar): 696.7 Mtrits/s
  Throughput (SIMD): 302.3 Mtrits/s

Benchmark 4: Sparse Optimization
---------------------------------
  Array size: 16384
  Hamming weight: 128 (0.8%)
  Iterations: 10000
  Dense: 105.443 ms (10.544 μs/op)
  Sparse: 0.719 ms (0.072 μs/op)
  Speedup: 146.65× (theoretical: 128.0×)

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
SUMMARY
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

✓ All correctness tests PASSED
✓ Performance benchmarks completed successfully
✓ Kernel is ready for production use
